Bash(git -C /Users/sb/Dev/chirostretch-wp commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add tokenized applicant status flow

Per Access & Identity Charter - applicants check status via secure
token link without creating a WordPress account.

Token flow:
- 256-bit token generated on application submission
- SHA-256 hash stored, raw token sent in email only
- Timing-safe comparison via hash_equals\(\)
- Token invalidated on approval/rejection/withdrawal

New files:
- application-status.php: Status page controller with rewrite rules
- templates/application-status-*.php: Status templates

Updates to franchise-application-cpt.php:
- ACF fields for token storage \(status_token_hash, status_token_valid\)
- gform_advancedpostcreation_post_after_creation hook for token gen
- Custom merge tag {status_link} for GF notifications
- Token invalidation on terminal status transitions

Also includes dashboard templates for role-based routing.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

LEFT JOIN wp_posts parent ON p.post_parent = parent.ID  
WHERE p.post_type = ''acf-field''
AND p.post_content LIKE ''%s:4:""type"";s:7:""message""%''
LIMIT 10" local)

Normalize practitioner expertise to taxonomies

Bash(git -C /Users/sb/Dev/chirostretch-wp commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add environment-based plugin loader for deployment safety

Infrastructure:
- _env-loader.php: Manages which mu-plugins load per environment
- Environment detection: wp_get_environment_type\(\) â†’ WP_ENV â†’ ''production''
- Configurable blocklists for dev-only and non-production plugins

Changes to mailhog-smtp.php:
- Add environment guard \(local/development only\)
- Prevents SMTP config from loading in production

Documentation:
- Complete README.md with plugin inventory
- Environment configuration instructions
- Development guidelines for new plugins
- Troubleshooting section

Deployment strategy:
- Set WP_ENVIRONMENT_TYPE in wp-config.php
- No additional deployment steps needed
- Dev plugins automatically disabled in production

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/sb/Dev/chirostretch-wp commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Replace third-party link rewriter with in-house solution

Replaced replace-internal-link-urls-main plugin with custom mu-plugin:

New mu-plugin \(headless-link-rewriter.php\):
- Uses chirostretch_get_frontend_url\(\) for environment-aware URLs  
- Works in all environments \(local, staging, production\)
- Supports both GraphQL and REST API requests
- Adds data-internal-link attribute for client-side handling
- Applies to the_content, the_excerpt, and GraphQL content fields

Benefits over third-party plugin:
- No hardcoded localhost URLs
- Consistent with existing headless architecture
- Maintainable alongside other mu-plugins
- Reduces plugin overhead

The old plugin was deactivated and can be removed from wp-content/plugins.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/sb/Dev/chirostretch-wp commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add SEO file URL rewriting \(sitemaps, robots.txt, llms.txt\)

Extended headless-link-rewriter.php to rewrite URLs in SEO files:

WordPress Core Sitemap:
- wp_sitemaps_posts_entry - Post/page/CPT URLs
- wp_sitemaps_taxonomies_entry - Category/tag URLs  
- wp_sitemaps_users_entry - Author archive URLs

Yoast Sitemap:
- wpseo_sitemap_entry - Yoast sitemap entries

robots.txt:
- robots_txt - Sitemap references

llms.txt:
- wpseo_llms_txt_output - LLM instructions file

Result: All URLs in sitemaps, robots.txt, and llms.txt now point
to the frontend instead of WordPress backend.

Note: Sitemap index still shows WordPress URLs \(less critical since
individual sitemaps have correct URLs\).

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
